headline: Badger Meter Gears Up to Report Q1 Earnings: What's in the Offing?
summary: BMI's performance is likely to have benefited from demand for its solutions. However, the uncertain macro backdrop, higher costs and competition are concerns.

headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From Abbott Laboratories Stock Ahead Of Q1 Earnings
summary: Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) will release its first-quarter earnings results before the opening bell on Wednesday, April 16. Analysts expect the company to report quarterly earnings at $1.07 per share, up from 98 cents per share in the year-ago period. According to data from Benzinga Pro, Abbott Laboratories projects quarterly revenue at $10.41 billion, compared to $9.96 billion a year earlier.
